channel.title: Aprils Fools Day on VGALTES blog
channel.description: Recent content in Aprils Fools Day on VGALTES blog

item.title: A Premier League team will win the Champions League this year
item.description: Spain and Germany are dominating with an iron fist last Champions League editions. After a lot of investment, a Premier League team is ready to conquer the longed for trophy. In this article we’ll demonstrate this fact. The data We’ve borrowed the data for this study from the UEFA’s official page. If you go to this address http://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/season=2011/matches/all/index.html# you’ll see all the matches played in the season 2010⁄2011. Change the year in the query string to see another year’s results.
